page.title: 11TRANSPORT
page.content: Belper Town is served well in forms of public transport with both bus and rail stations. Belper is situated on an{"Inter City" Line. One of the largest uses of this station is for people commuting to work especially into{Derby.}The Bus services,largely{National Trent}link Belper with other large towns and the smaller villages in the area. Milford is on the{A6}and is serviced by a public bus service for inhabitants wishing to travel North or South. Hazelwood has a limited bus service. In the case of both Milford and Hazelwood there is a strong reliance on private transport.
